Reviews.Title: “Basic accommodation - with a cheap price! I was very happy.”

Reviews.Content: university dorm converted summer accommodation guests 50 clean accommodation shared bathroom free parking free breakfast included price inside spartan eg tv hard floors etc nights fine little trouble bringing bags steps lobby train station 23 minute walk central montreal people complain accommodation wallet else prepared pay lot service desk spoke english french fluently convenient stay 2 nights montreal easy
